title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer: use Ollama models as drop-in LLMs for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-chat-app
summary: Minimal React chat example showing streaming responses from any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps ollama with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter, and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings + Chroma/Qdrant and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers threads with Ollama models and supports file snippets.

title: modelfusion-ollama
summary: ModelFusion TypeScript integration: unified interface for Ollama chat, stream, tool-use and embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI note assistance: summarize, rewrite, and Q&A using Ollama models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST & WebSocket with token-rate limiting.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, SSE streaming, and ergonomic model pull helpers.
